long_description: The Benchmade Osborne Axis Lock Knife raises the bar for quality and style in a lock-blade knife. Carry this trusty companion for all your cutting tasks on outdoor adventures. Elegant Warren Osborne design offers a slim profile with stylish performance. Premium CPM-S90V stainless-steel blade features excellent corrosion resistance and superb edge qualities; modified reverse tanto blade shape enhances tip strength. Scales on handle provide a strong, comfortable frame that is easy to handle; carbon-fiber frame is light weight. Patented AXIS(R) locking mechanism securely locks blade and complements smooth one-handed opening and closure. Reversible, tip-up steel belt clip offers multiple carry options. The Benchmade Osborne Axis Lock Knife features blue anodized aluminum barrel spacers and stainless-steel liners.
short_description: The Benchmade Osborne Axis Lock Knife raises the bar for quality and style in a lock-blade knife. Carry this trusty companion for all your cutting tasks on outdoor adventures.
